body_html:
You are confusing CUDA with cuDNN.
Our website says we support cuDNN 5.1 for prebuilt binaries, so anything else wont work.

Moreover, with TensorFlow 1.2, we are dropping support for GPUs on MacOS.
I recomment switching to linux if you need to run TF on GPUs.
body_text:
You are confusing CUDA with cuDNN.
Our website says we support cuDNN 5.1 for prebuilt binaries, so anything else wont work.
Moreover, with TensorFlow 1.2, we are dropping support for GPUs on MacOS.
I recomment switching to linux if you need to run TF on GPUs.
body:
You are confusing CUDA with cuDNN.
Our website says we support cuDNN 5.1 for prebuilt binaries, so anything else wont work.

Moreover, with TensorFlow 1.2, we are dropping support for GPUs on MacOS.
I recomment switching to linux if you need to run TF on GPUs.
